description: This Python script implements an interactive SQLite database shell, allowing users to execute SQL commands and perform database inspections such as listing tables, describing tables, and showing schemas.

methods.name: print_help
methods.description: Prints help information about shell commands

methods.name: list_tables
methods.description: Lists all user-defined tables in the database

methods.name: show_schema
methods.description: Displays the CREATE statement(s) for a specified table or all tables

methods.name: describe_table
methods.description: Shows the structure of a specified table including column info

methods.name: execute_query
methods.description: Executes a SQL statement and displays results if applicable

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function managing the interactive shell loop, handling user input and commands
